::: {.callout-note}
## How to Submit

**Homework Solutions — due Monday 11:59 pm PT**

1. Upload as **one single, readable PDF** (not a photo dump)
2. Organize clearly; show work; label final answers
3. Include units and state assumptions

**Grade Memo — due Wednesday 11:59 pm PT**

1. Self-assess using the rubric and posted solutions
2. Write ~250–400 words covering:
   - What you got right (and why)
   - What broke (and where)
   - What you learned
   - What you'll do differently
3. Include per-problem self-rating (1–5)
4. Include AI/collaboration disclosure
:::
